ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Have you thought about what you cultivate?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Just ponder over what you sow:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Have you considered the seeds you till?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Have you seen what you sow?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So what is your opinion regarding what you sow?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Do you not see what you sow.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Have you considered what you sow?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Have you considered the soil you till?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Have ye seen that which ye cultivate?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Have you thought about what crops you plant?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Have you considered what you sow?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: See ye the seed that ye sow in the ground?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Tell Me! The seed that you sow in the ground.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Ponder upon the soil you till,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Have you seen what you cultivate?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And have you seen that [seed] which you sow?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [56:63] Have you considered what you sow?, [what] you stir of the earth to place seeds therein?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Have ye seen that which ye cultivate) of grains? 644
